@jessgrondin @ELGL50 @CityHallSelfie Thanks for braving those heights and hosting me in beautiful @CityPortland I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs healthy for me to continue visiting city halls & comparing #localgov notes on council chambers etc. while on vacation but no sense in stopping now üòä
@BriannaSunryd @jessgrondin @CityPortland @ELGL50 @CityHallSelfie @NEELGL @TownOfAmherst I tried to get my office relocated up one story to the clock tower but building code

Also, if my eyes look crazy it‚Äôs because I hate heights and the clock tower freaks me out a bit! But also, where‚Äôs the #cityhallselfie day clock tower category, @ELGL50?! Maybe this fits in the historic category. üòÇ @CityHallSelfie @BriannaSunryd https://t.co/5Lq7Wn5HfX

My #localgov sister @jessgrondin felt so bad that I missed #CityHallSelfie Day that she gave me the grand tour of @CityPortland ‚Äî including a visit up to the clock tower. If you love marble, ocean views, & super staff then this one is for you! https://t.co/Lpj4a75R4W
